name: Avo
headline: Fixing data quality in product analytics.
description:
Avo fixes data quality in product analytics. Avo helps teams like Ikea, Wolt, Fender, Sixt and Condé Nast to plan, implement and monitor analytics, so they don't fly blind and fail to build great user experiences

Start your step-by-step path to settle your analytics debt:

Step 1: Better tracking plan management.
Avo is a better alternative to the "tracking plan spreadsheet", keeping your data quality high and your schema sync'd with all downstream tools. Import your tracking plan for an instant audit, then design more scalable data for every feature release, even before you're an expert.

Step 2: Better data validation.
Avo is ongoing observability of actual tracking compared with tracking plan. One-time install the Avo Inspector SDK to see what's wrong with your tracking today so you can start making it better.

Step 3: Better analytics release workflow.
Avo is the self-serve analytics governance, changing how PMs, devs and data scientists collaborate to plan, implement and verify their product analytics. What used to take Patreon 1-4 days for every feature release, now takes 30-60 minutes.

founders.name: Stefania Olafsdottir, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
Mathematician & philosopher. Deep passion for understanding people and things. Always choose the adventure. Make stuff happen. One day be able to do a pull-up. Drink coffee. Eat ice cream.

Find me in San Francisco, Iceland, and as @stefaniabje on the internets.

# Guarantee event data quality, upstream
Avo helps teams find, fix, and prevent data quality issues, so they can build great user experiences.
[Book a demo](https://www.avo.app/<https:/www.avo.app/tour#demo>)[Try sandbox](https://www.avo.app/<https:/www.avo.app/sandbox>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65d4b72501154ff5cf14a85f_Avo%20Header%20Illustration.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65c3e8f27e109b5a236b1266_fender-dark.svg)[Case study →](https://www.avo.app/</customers/fender-case-study>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65d4b35f3f976f175b33020f_Ikea%20logo%20\(1\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65d4b144e5d0b658492e75bd_image%20\(2\).svg)[Case study →](https://www.avo.app/<https:/www.avo.app/customers/wolt>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65d4b2a9f8e4e044b7fa2f43_image%20\(3\).svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65c3e95b38bc300d419a0415_rappi-dark.svg)[Case study →](https://www.avo.app/</customers/rappi-developers>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65c3ea24e1ee58401adb6a59_bill-dark.svg)
## Finally, a roadmap from bad data to good data
1.
Discover your outstanding data quality issues in seconds.
2.
Systematically fix your data quality, one resolved issue at a time.
3.
Prevent issues from resurfacing with a robust tracking plan and flawless implementation.
## A suite of tools to help you make the most of your modern data stack
![Data observability & monitoring](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65d4d3255d949c18d3513915_Data%20observability%20and%20monitoring.png)
![Collaborative schema management](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65d4d325c01734c943a32970_Collaborative%20Schema%20Management.png)
![Fast & accurate implementation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65d4d325aa01840b89173a20_Fast%20and%20accurate%20implementation.png)
![Data Observability & Monitoring](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65cfd052dc40d044cab2b149_Data%20observability%20and%20monitoring.jpg)
### Data observability & monitoring
Instant overview of the actual state of your tracking, customizable alerts on violations, and one-click tracking plan edits
[Data observability](https://www.avo.app/</data-observability>)
![Collaborative Schema Management](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65cfd07653be2669a3670a7b_Collaborative%20Schema%20Management.jpg)
### Collaborative schema management
GitHub meets spreadsheets for schema management. Real-time feedback, audits and peer-reviews to prevent bad data design
[Tracking Plan Management](https://www.avo.app/</tracking-plan-management>)
![Fast & Accurate Implementation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65cfd0895356dfea803c0bc9_Fast%20and%20accurate%20implementation.jpg)
### Fast & accurate implementation
Prevent errors with auto-generated implementation instructions, and verify that the analytics are deployed according to spec.
[Analytics Implementation](https://www.avo.app/</event-instrumentation>)
## Accelerate your business. The world's most effective teams build with Avo.
[Case studies](https://www.avo.app/</customers>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/6614d2b8bf7ea0b8033d40bb_conde-nast-logo-black%201.svg)Avo has been a tremendous help for us. For a company as big as ours, we need Avo to help us standardize all of our data across a lot of platforms, brands, and markets, no matter where it is coming from.Read more reviews on G2![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/6614d263ee7cfefd56f2a4e7_Ioana%20Vasicuta%20Conde%20Nast.png)Ioana VasicutaData Analyst at Conde Nast](https://www.avo.app/<https:/www.g2.com/products/avo/reviews>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/6614d51692650775a8392130_Delivery%20Hero%20Horizontal%20White.png)We have been using Avo for more than two years now and I can’t imagine not having Avo as a single source of truth for our hundreds of event definitions.Read more reviews on G2![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/6614d2649073607a440d3a0d_Bharat%20K%20Delivery%20Hero.png)Bharath KrishnamachariDirector of Product Analytics](https://www.avo.app/<https:/www.g2.com/products/avo/reviews>)[![Culture amp logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65bce3e7a69ba4fc631f3912_culture-amp-light.svg)Buying Avo was possibly the most impactful decision I've made. I don't know how product companies do any analytics without Avo. It's become the foundation of our analytics.Read full G2 review![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65cfff65f47783af16614ce8_nocholas.jpeg)Nicholas ThreapletonLead Product Analyst](https://www.avo.app/<https:/www.g2.com/products/avo/reviews/avo-review-6683897>)
### Easily find (and fix) your data quality issues
Avo’s Inspector gets you to cleaner data in minutes, not months.
  * Forget hours of manual debugging and data rabbit holes with a clear breakdown of the issues you need to act on.
  * Get back on top of your data quality, one fixed issue at a time.
  * Enjoy full confidence in your data and wave goodbye to broken dashboards.


[Meet Avo Inspector](https://www.avo.app/</data-observability>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65d4d264f52f645d07b6acc2_Inspector%20overview.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65d4d264558953012b40d1a3_Tracking%20plan%20overview.png)
### Everything you need to team up on data design
Break down the silos with seamless collaboration in the Avo Tracking Plan.
  * Branched workflows and peer reviews make it easy to work on data together.
  * Make your data design accessible through a single source of truth.
  * Design better data faster with automatic feedback and reusable schemas from your event library.


[Explore Avo’s tracking plan](https://www.avo.app/</tracking-plan-management>)
### Ship faster, with flawless tracking
It’s never been easier to implement analytics.
  * Work seamlessly with developers through foolproof implementation instructions and code snippets. 
  * No more back and forth. Instantly validate tracking changes with implementation status and in-app debuggers.
  * Error free tracking is guaranteed with code-generated, type-safe wrappers.


[Implement tracking with Avo](https://www.avo.app/</event-instrumentation>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65d4d26499d12dc82f24b9b0_Implementation%20overview.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65b671b80c07b825f14b65c6/65d4d2645770aa079c2ae93e_image%201.png)
### Power your data governance and enablement
Make sure everyone, everywhere is working with the latest version of your schema.
  * See event and property descriptions from Avo inline in your analytics tool.
  * Keep data validation in your CDP up to date with the tracking plan.
  * Receive a webhook every time the Avo tracking plan is updated.


[Explore publishing](https://www.avo.app/<https:/www.avo.app/docs/publishing/publishing/overview>)
# Ready to elevate your data quality?
[Sign up for free](https://www.avo.app/<https:/www.avo.app/onboarding/>)[Try sandbox](https://www.avo.app/<https:/www.avo.app/sandbox>)
Guarantee data quality upstream.

generated_description:
### Meet Avo: Cleaning Up Data Quality in Product Analytics

Founded in 2018 and a proud graduate of Y Combinator’s Batch W19, Avo has set its sights on a critical but often overlooked area: data quality in product analytics. Based in San Francisco, this compact team of ten serves household names like Ikea, Wolt, Fender, Sixt, and Condé Nast, helping them avoid the pitfalls of flying blind by improving how they plan, implement, and monitor their analytics.

#### Mission Statement
Avo is all about fixing data quality in product analytics. They believe every team deserves to build great user experiences, underpinned by reliable data.

#### The Avo Methodology: Three Steps to Data Quality
Avo lays out a straightforward roadmap to help teams tackle their analytics debt:

1. **Better Tracking Plan Management**: Replace the traditional and often cumbersome tracking plan spreadsheet with a dynamic tool that ensures your data quality is high, keeping your schema synchronized with downstream tools. You can import your tracking plan and audit it instantly, allowing even novices to design scalable data for new feature releases.

2. **Better Data Validation**: With Avo, ongoing observability of your tracking versus your tracking plan is just a one-time SDK install away. The Avo Inspector helps identify issues in your current tracking setup, putting you on the fast track to better analytical accuracy.

3. **Better Analytics Release Workflow**: Avo transforms the analytics governance process, enabling project managers, developers, and data scientists to work collaboratively. Tasks that used to take as long as four days can now be accomplished in under an hour. This means faster releases, fewer headaches, and a more robust analytics foundation.

#### Core Features
Avo's suite of tools, designed to streamline the complexities of data quality, includes:

- **Data Observability & Monitoring**: Get an instant overview of your data’s health, customizable alerts for violations, and an easy way to edit tracking plans with a single click.
  
- **Collaborative Schema Management**: Think of it as GitHub for your data schemas—real-time feedback and peer reviews prevent bad data designs.

- **Fast & Accurate Implementation**: Avo generates implementation instructions to minimize errors, ensuring that analytics are deployed according to specifications. This removes the traditional back-and-forth communication issues between teams.

#### Elevate Your Data Processes
By harnessing Avo, you can systematically identify data quality issues, resolve them, and put preventive measures in place to ensure they don’t resurface. It’s about moving from bad data to good data, faster.

#### The Avo Experience
With Avo, users are reporting transformative results. Analysts from large organizations say that Avo establishes a single source of truth across numerous platforms and simplifies how data is processed and utilized. This clarity translates to better decision-making and enhanced user experiences.

For those looking to improve their data quality, Avo offers a free trial, allowing teams to explore its features firsthand. 

If your team is entangled in the web of data quality issues, Avo is your ally in breaking free and building a foundation of reliable analytics. Curious to learn more? Check out [Avo’s website](https://www.avo.app/) and take the first step towards cleaner, more effective data management.
